title: In game freezing/game freezing entire computer
body:
After the recent patch every few games my League Client will completely freeze my computer and force me to hard reset my entire PC. No other option works, I have completely disabled the xbox game bar and all its features, I have tried every single listed "fix" on every board forum that is posted and have 0 positive results.

This is resulting in multiple leave busters which has left me waiting for 20 minutes 5 times, multiple times. I have played since 2012 and spent hundreds of dollars on RP. 

Please, suggest any fixes or consider client resolutions that will stop this from happening.

replies.body:
First off, let's not enter into any more matchmade queues until we've smoothed this freezing out. I don't want you to end up getting more leaverbusters for this!

Freezing in game can be caused by a pretty big number of different things. Typically these issues can be fixed by simple driver updates, but sometimes it happens from PC overheating which is a much bigger ordeal entirely. Go through all of the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover all your basics, and let me know what helps and what doesn't.
